column4: After installing Apache2 I see that my httpd.conf file is empty. Why is that?
you need to now edit apache.conf
What is in there to edit if the file is empty? Is there a sample fiel?
the httpd.conf file is present but empty
God, I love this cube desktop thing :)
apache2.conf is filled but it does not have DirectoryIndex
you now have to deal with sites enabled.  You trying to do virtual hosting, right?
Hang on... got to go to laptop
I do ColdFusion development and I need to have Apache read .cfm files. So I need to add it to the DirectoryIndex
